overview: Rick Zitelman is the President and founder of The Zitelman Group, Inc., a merchant and investment banking firm specializing in early stage companies and real estate, as well as Valuation Services, Inc., a firm that values closely held entities and their related ownership interests. Rick received his BS in Economics from the Wharton School at the University of Pennsylvania and is a CPA, CVA (Certified Valuation Analyst) and a Registered Principal with the Securities Exchange Commission.
